content.label: The controls don’t even work lol. You need to tilt your phone to move your ship, but when you tilt your phone, the ship doesn’t move. Fix it you rats

I’ve been searching. So long. For this game. I got it when I was a kid and it was the the first app on my iPod touch. Now 12 years later I found out that this gameclub owns the rights? Now I have to pay for other games. To just play this one? I’m kinda sadden to see that. Thanks for ruining a memory. I was so happy to find this but a slap of pay a subscription. Yeah. Lol okay. Am I giving my money to a unicorn? Or the leprechaun?

I’m so grateful you’ve revived these games especially this one !!
I can remember sharing this with my daughter when it came out she loved it .....
If I keep sharing it’ll sound like a cheesy Facebook post about how beautifully cliche life is & how profound this work can be ... regardless it feels like forever ago 
she always asks me from time to time to dig up an old app from the hard drive that molded our lives & misses and if i remember ...blablabla nevertheless she shared this when I visited her the other day 
It’s completely awesomely excellent of you evolving developed programmers to salvage our patronage like youse guys have - it was like being with my little girl as a little girl again !
Utmost Respect!!
Game cube ruined it apparently. All it does is crash at random times.
All the time. Unplayable.
When I go to pick up power ups or special cannon pick ups, the game crashss

This game was pretty fun back then when I still used an iPod, but guess what happened. Game club. Game club just buys games and puts subscriptions on them. So yeah. The game is good don’t get me wrong but because game club owns it now, I’m gonna give it a 1 star.
But if you’re bringing back games that were essentially abandoned, you should also do Spirit and Reiner Knizia’s Samurai!
i really like this game but i can't play it with full version what about one survival mode free?please!!!
This was my very first game that I got when I finally got an iPhone. Very good memories here. :)
It’s great i just wish there was more content. I know before the game went down there was an alien mode coming
I remember playing this forever ago you guys should update it for iOS 11 or just remaster it as a new game
Please update the app to work with iOS 12

title.label: PLEASE make it playable on iOS 11!

One of funnest apps I’ve ever encountered! Please make an update. This app founded mobile gaming for me and there’s nothing quite like it
Love the game but needs an update for IOS 11 pleaseeeeee!!!!!!
It is awesome but update it more plz
I used to play this game everyday and it was my favorite app. It was a great idea for a game. You gotta bring it back or at the very least make a plunderland 2! Thanks for making an awesome game.
One of my favorite games! I've been excited to see the abduction levels, hopefully I will get to play them soon.
This is a great game, but they need to update it for the iPhone 7. They should at least update it for the 6 and the 6S

Abduction needs to be added.
More items need to be added.
More levels need to be added.
This game is awesome!!! I love playing it. But it's time to update the game, add a new level. Add something. Your last update was for the iPhone 5, come on.

It's really fun, but it's WAY too glitchy. Srsly. I can't even access the story without having to mess around with it! Nothing shows up so I don't know what I'm touching. Either give me my money back or fix your game ( I'm on iPad btw )
Was fun on my iPad mini until I can no longer push the play button on the bottom right corner. All I get to do now is go into settings. Please fix this issue

Intuitive controls. Great gameplay. One thing, an update would be nice. The game and the game makers have so much potential, and it would also be nice to explore the abduction mode in the game as well. I hope to see more!

The fire mechanism is really annoying, you shouldn't have to touch the boat to fire. Second of all, there are a lot of glitches, most notable is the one when you pause the game, come back and then find that your ships guns are in the wrong place and that you can't fire anymore. Otherwise, great game, extremely fun.
